_help.basicUsername: The String HTTP basic username for pulling issues into Pivotal Tracker.
_help.basicPassword: The String password for the basicUsername.
_help.closeIssues: The Boolean flag to indicate whether or not to close issues on Pivotal activity.
_help.closeOn: The String to indicate the Pivotal Tracker status on which to close issues. Any of: started/finished/delivered/accepted. Required if closeIssues is on.
_help.githubToken: The String OAuth token from GitHub.
_help.secretToken: The String web hook token used for closing issues.
_help.updateComments: The Boolean flag to indicate whether or not to push Pivotal Tracker comments to the GitHub issue.
